text:
5Maternal and Perinatal Health Outcomes
Participating US Government agencies, along 
with partner governments and multiple partner 
organizations, built on existing district maternal 
and child health services. SMGL-supported 
staff conducted routine monitoring during the 
first year of the project, including baseline and 
endline assessments3 before and after Phase 1.
Results from monitoring and evaluation 
indicate that SMGL interventions are 
effective, because of a combination
